column4: is there a way to get information on all the USB ports on my computer (back side and front side), to see their status and to know whether there's something wrong with them?
how many ls- commands are there diabolix?
i did lsusb and it showed only 3 lines. But I have more than 3 USB ports on my computer. what's wrong?
as stated before tell us how many are in use
yes, you are right in guessing that I have 9 USB ports. How did you guess?
It sees the root controller and not the siblings
i currently have one USB port in use: iPod is pluggen in
but I bet your only using 3 usb devices
I'm using only one USB port (for iPod) but lsusb shows 3 lines. PLease see http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/22251/
how do i know what chipset i have?
your mouse and keyboard are not usb?
no. mouse and keyboard are circular thingies
I have to run to eat but It looks like in your bios all the USBs are not turned on  check them and let me know il be back in 20
how do you know that about my bios?
reboot and hit either F1 or DEL key to get into the bios
